thread.section_title: Protea Hotel by Marriott Entebbe - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful hotel
thread.title_full: Wonderful hotel - Review of Protea Hotel by Marriott Entebbe, Entebbe, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Eponymist13
title: Wonderful hotel
text:
I had previously stayed at this hotel in the beginning of December, and wanted to wait until my next visit on January 1, 2017 where I stayed for two more days to make
sure my first impressions were accurate. The security at the gate is to make sure that the hotel is not a target like the one in Mumbai. I was impressed with the warm welcome I received, and found the same enthusiasm when I checked in at 3:00 AM on January 1, 2017. My hotel room was extremely clean, and the bed was extremely comfortable. Shuttle service is excellent, and very dependable, even at the wee hours. The food department does a good job with the food presentation. You can expect freshness, as well as a variety of what is offered on the menu. Great ice cream. The restaurant is large enough, and they have tables outside facing Lake Victoria. This hotel has a modern elevator, and the WiFi is free
and moderately fast.
